DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to investigate the effect of Tai Chi and Qigong practice on cranial oxyhaemoglobin level, blood pressures and autonomic nervous system responses.
DOC.brief_title: The Relationship Between Cranial Near-InfraRed Oxygenation(NIRO) and Heart Rate Variability During Mental Exercise
DOC.criteria: A minimal of 3 years experience on practice of either Tai Chi or Qigong Unable to communicate or follow an exercise protocol Presence of cognitive impairments Symptomatic cardiovascular diseases Hypertension Diagnosis of stroke Parkinson's disease, or other neurologic disorder, peripheral neuropathy and cancer.
